name: devPat
description:
devPat

Overview -

You're a teacher at an esteemed video game development academy. Your goal is to solve the schools' mysteries while helping your 5 female students go through the day, collect their student files and give them a pat.

Controls -

Z  [A Button] - Validate

X [B Button] - Cancel

Enter [Start Button] - Opens menu

You may check the menu to see your students information (file required) and current progression.

Credits -

Masaa (aka Marthur): Game Design, Level Design, Scripting, Story, Music, Misc. Art

Chen: Character Design, CG Art

Balcerzak: QA
